00019 #include "agg_render_buffer.h"
00020 
00021 
00022 namespace agg
00023 {
00024 
00025     //========================================================================
00026 
00027     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028     render_buffer::~render_buffer()
00029     {
00030         delete [] m_rows;
00031     }
00032 
00033 
00034     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     render_buffer::render_buffer() :
00036         m_buf(0),
00037         m_rows(0),
00038         m_width(0),
00039         m_height(0),
00040         m_max_height(0)
00041     {
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     void render_buffer::attach(unsigned char* buf,
00047                                unsigned width, 
00048                                unsigned height,
00049                                int      row_bytes)
00050     {
00051         m_buf = buf;
00052         m_width = width;
00053         m_height = height;
00054         m_row_bytes = row_bytes;
00055         if(height > m_max_height)
00056         {
00057             delete [] m_rows;
00058             m_rows = new unsigned char* [m_max_height = height];
00059         }
00060 
00061         unsigned char* row_ptr = m_buf;
00062 
00063         if(row_bytes < 0)
00064         {
00065             row_ptr = m_buf - int(height - 1) * row_bytes;
00066         }
00067 
00068         unsigned char** rows = m_rows;
00069 
00070         while(height--)
00071         {
00072             *rows++ = row_ptr;
00073             row_ptr += row_bytes;
00074         }
00075 
00076         m_clip_box.x1 = 0;
00077         m_clip_box.y1 = 0;
00078         m_clip_box.x2 = int(m_width)  - 1;
00079         m_clip_box.y2 = int(m_height) - 1;
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00083     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084     void render_buffer::set_clip_box(rect cb)
00085     {
00086         cb.normalize();
00087         if(cb.clip(rect(0, 0, m_width - 1, m_height - 1)))
00088         {
00089             m_clip_box = cb;
00090         }
00091         else
00092         {
00093             m_clip_box.x1 = 1;
00094             m_clip_box.y1 = 1;
00095             m_clip_box.x2 = 0;
00096             m_clip_box.y2 = 0;
00097         }
00098     }
00099 
00100 
00101 
00102 }
